block.p: CHILEWICH--Simon. The officers, Board of Directors, and staff of UJA-Federation of New York mourn the passing of Simon Chilewich, a prominent figure of the Jewish community whose commitment and generosity profoundly impacted the most vulnerable, and strengthened Jewish life and learning in New York, in Israel, and worldwide. We extend our deepest sympathies to Simon's children; Melvin, Martin, and Sandra; and to the entire family. Morris W. Offit, President Susan K. Stern, Chair of the Board John S. Ruskay, Exec. V.P. & C.E.O.

CHILEWICH--Simon. The officers, Board of Directors, and staff of UJA-Federation of New York mourn the passing of Simon Chilewich, a prominent figure of the Jewish community whose commitment and generosity profoundly impacted the most vulnerable, and strengthened Jewish life and learning in New York, in Israel, and worldwide. We extend our deepest sympathies to Simon's children; Melvin, Martin, and Sandra; and to the entire family. Morris W. Offit, President Susan K. Stern, Chair of the Board John S. Ruskay, Exec. V.P. & C.E.O.
